gov.usgs.anss.net

Class GenericServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.net.GenericServerHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TTHandler

    public abstract class GenericServerHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    this class handles a single socket connection to the thread. It is a pool thread so it is created, and waits to be assigned a socket. It runs until that socket is closed or potentially timed out by the pool management in GenericServer. This is an abstract class that must be extended by the user specialization class which implements the services. 
     switch   arg       Description
 -dbg               More output
